Sentence.value: Meniscal allograft transplantation is surgery in which a meniscus -- a cartilage ring in the knee -- is placed into your knee.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Meniscal [[allograft|C0522536]] [[transplantation|C0040732]] is [[surgery|C0543467]] in which a meniscus -- a cartilage ring in the [[knee|C0022742]] -- is placed into your [[knee|C0022742]].

Sentence.value: If your doctor finds that you are a good candidate for a meniscus transplant, x-rays of your knee are usually taken to find a meniscus that will fit your knee.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If your doctor finds that you are a good candidate for a meniscus transplant, [[x-rays|C0043299]] of your [[knee|C0022742]] are usually taken to find a meniscus that will fit your knee.

Sentence.value: - The surgeon inspects the cartilage and ligaments of your knee, confirming that a meniscus transplant is appropriate, and that you don't have severe arthritis of the knee.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - The [[surgeon|C0582175]] inspects the cartilage and ligaments of your knee, confirming that a meniscus transplant is appropriate, and that you don't have severe [[arthritis|C0003864]] of the [[knee|C0022742]].

Sentence.value: Some people can still have pain after the meniscus is removed.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Some [[people|C0027361]] can still have [[pain|C0030193]] after the meniscus is removed.
